title: Biological contributions to biological ion exchange
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,877-888
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00766A, Paper
Karl Zimmermann, Pranav Sampara, Ryan Ziels, Madjid Mohseni
DOC removal by biological ion exchange (BIEX) water filters is mostly via sulphate-based secondary IEX and less through biodegradation mechanisms, which were similar to those in BAC filters, although the two filters had very different microbial community compositions.
